location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire, to John Wedderburn, Accountant General, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter reporting that Mr Morrison, Surgeon of HC Cruizer Amhersthad been placed in medical charge of the Residency at Bushire owing to the departure of Assistant Surgeon Henry Johnston on a sick certificate. The letter also reports that Mr Morrison had been issued with a statement to that effect in order that he could claim allowances for his services at the Residency.
